mapper.select: select lid , lprofile , lgrade , ltitle , lprice from lecture
mapper.insert: insert into lecture (ltitle , lprofile , lintro , lbook , lprice , lopendate , lperiod , lcount , tid , lgrade) values(#{ltitle}, #{lprofile}, #{lintro}, #{lbook}, #{lprice}, #{lopendate}, #{lperiod}, #{lcount}, 1, #{lgrade})
mapper.select: SELECT l.lid , l.ltitle , l.lintro , l.lbook , l.lprice , l.lopendate , l.lperiod , l.lcount , l.lprofile , l.lgrade , t.tintro , t.tsubject , u.name , u.id FROM lecture l INNER JOIN teacher t ON l.tid = t.tid INNER JOIN user u ON t.uid = u.uid WHERE lid = #{lid}
select lid , lgrade , ltitle , lprice from lecture where lprice = 0 limit 4;
select vid , vtitle from video where lid = #{lid}
SELECT u.id FROM teacher t INNER JOIN lecture l ON t.tid = l.tid INNER JOIN user u ON t.uid = u.uid WHERE l.lid = #{lid}

SELECT up.id FROM purchase_test p INNER JOIN user up ON p.uid = up.uid INNER JOIN pitem pit ON p.pid = pit.pid INNER JOIN lecture l ON pit.lid = l.lid WHERE DATE(NOW()) <= DATE_ADD(DATE(ptime), INTERVAL l.lperiod DAY) AND pit.pistatus <> 'refund' AND l.lid = #{lid} AND up.uid = #{uid}
